metadata.title: CVE-2023-43373 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Hoteldruid v3.0.5 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerabilityvia the n_utente_agg parameter at /hoteldruid/interconnessioni.php.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
